name: Talons of the Beast (Part 2)
description: Playable singleplayer, co-op or deathmatch. The switch at the back of the villa did not open the gate, as you had hoped. Instead, you are enveloped in a green flash. _Teleport._ Cool. Dry. Air conditioned. A complex of some kind. Zombie down a corridor in front of you. You open up with the pistol and he falls. Then you take a shot in the back ...
